```{r setup}
library(fars)
```

## read 2013 accident data 
```{r}
accident <- fars_read(system.file("extdata", "accident_2013.csv.bz2", package = "fars"))
str(accident)
dim(accident)
```

## create a list of data frames with columns of Month and Year in each
```{r}
df_list <- fars_read_years(2014)
head(df_list[[1]])
```

## summarize accident by year and month
```{r}
n_accident <- fars_summarize_years(c(2013,2014))
head(n_accident)

```

## plot accident map for state at a specified year 
```{r}
fars_map_state(1,2014)

```
